description: Dashboard displays overview statistics
steps: Verify Dashboard is the default landing screen
Verify 'Reports This Week' count is displayed
Verify navigation to relevant detail screen

description: Dashboard shows recent reports list
steps: Verify up to 5 recent reports are displayed
Verify each report shows title, project name, and date
Verify each report shows status indicator
Verify navigation to Report Detail screen

description: Dashboard shows pending uploads queue
steps: Create entries while offline to generate upload queue
Go online and navigate to Dashboard
Verify count matches actual pending items
Verify progress indicator for active uploads
Verify navigation to Sync Status screen

description: Quick Capture FAB opens capture options
steps: Verify Floating Action Button is visible in bottom right
Verify options include: Photo, Video, Audio, Note

description: Quick Capture initiates photo capture without project selection
steps: Verify prompt to select project appears
Verify prompt to select or create report appears
Select existing report or create new
Verify photo is added to report

description: Pull-to-refresh updates dashboard data
Dashboard displays user and tenant context
steps: Verify user name or avatar is displayed in header
Verify current tenant/organization name is visible
Verify greeting message includes user's first name

description: Dashboard navigation drawer provides access to all sections
steps: Tap hamburger menu or swipe from left edge
Verify menu items: Dashboard, Projects, Reports, Media, Settings
Verify user profile section at top

description: Bottom navigation provides quick access to main sections
steps: Verify bottom navigation bar is visible
Verify tabs: Home, Projects, Capture, Reports, Settings

description: Dashboard shows sync status indicator
steps: Verify sync status indicator in header
When fully synced, verify green checkmark or 'Synced' text
When items pending, verify pending count badge
Verify navigation to Sync Status screen

description: Dashboard displays notifications badge
steps: Verify notification bell icon in header
Verify marking notification as read updates badge

description: Dashboard displays cached data when offline
steps: Login and navigate to Dashboard while online
Verify cached recent reports are displayed

description: Dashboard indicates stale data with timestamp
steps: Verify 'Last updated X minutes ago' message appears
Verify visual indicator that data may be stale

description: Dashboard layout adapts to screen orientation
steps: Navigate to Dashboard in portrait mode

description: Dashboard statistics animate on load
steps: Verify stat cards animate in with fade/slide

description: Empty state displayed when no data exists
steps: Verify empty state illustration is displayed
Verify helpful message explaining how to get started
Verify 'Create First Project' button is prominent

description: FAB hides when scrolling down, shows when scrolling up
steps: Navigate to Dashboard with enough content to scroll

description: Dashboard loads within acceptable time
steps: Measure time from login complete to Dashboard fully rendered
Verify Dashboard loads within 2 seconds on good connection

description: Dashboard handles API error gracefully
steps: Verify cached data is shown if available
Verify fresh attempt to load data

description: Dashboard is navigable with screen reader
steps: Verify stat cards are read with labels and values
Verify recent reports list is navigable
Verify FAB is announced as 'Quick capture, button'
Verify navigation elements are properly labeled
